tool_description: Calculate MRR and ARR based on revenue periods. Please make sure to include only recurring revenue items, excluding one-time charges and dividents - but including discounts.
name: BrewClub Recurring Revenue
title: BrewClub Recurring Revenue

api_list.name: Annual recurring revenue
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://recurring-revenue.p.rapidapi.com/recurringrevenue/arr"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "recurring-revenue.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Monthly Recurring Revenue
api_list.description: Calculates your MRR from the provided revenue periods. Include all recurring charges, excluding one-time charges and dividents, but including subtracted discounts.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://recurring-revenue.p.rapidapi.com/recurringrevenue/mrr"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "recurring-revenue.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
